ai-patthana18.1:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-patthana18.1:2.1_1: or cause or reasons not give rise to reason for the sake of a teaching,
ai-patthana18.1:3.1_0: It doesn’t because of root or reason to teach without a cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.1:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana18.1:4.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana18.1:5.1_0: or caused on account of teaching.
ai-patthana18.1:6.1_0: He doesn’t put his sarong or an upper robe on one shoulder, nor don’t get four things in five respects:
ai-patthana18.1:6.1_1: When one isn’t keen or preoccupied,
ai-patthana18.1:6.1_2: it seems to us when you have excellence
ai-patthana18.1:7.1_0: or even a canopy covered in the same way.
ai-patthana18.1:8.1_0: cause, condition, not reason for the sake of teaching, or for the sake of all the paths of the teaching,
ai-patthana18.1:9.1_0: It is a cause, condition for the reason, not for the sake of investigating, or for the sake of natural principles, etc.;
ai-patthana18.1:9.1_1: It is the cause, without reason, only the reason for the sake of natural principles, or with the object of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana18.1:9.1_2: It is the cause, without reason, only the reason for the sake of establishing, not for the sake of natural principles, or for the sake of natural principles, or for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of the teaching.
ai-patthana18.1:10.1_0: It is not the reason why, not by cause or reason, nor by the means of the teaching, nor by the object of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana18.1:10.1_2: It is not because of cause or reason, nor not for the sake of any cause, nor for the sake of the teaching, nor for the sake of its object, nor for the sake of investigating and for the sake of natural principles.
ai-patthana18.1:10.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana18.1:11.1_0: It is a cause, without reason, without cause or condition, for the sake of investigating, or for the sake of natural principles.
ai-patthana18.1:11.1_1: It is the cause, without reason, with the reason, not cause or condition for the sake of investigating, and for the sake of natural principles, etc.;
ai-patthana18.1:11.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana18.1:12.1_0: One was the cause of reasons for two or three drops, four or five trees next to each other. In the fifth place, when there was a person was born, the five composed of deeds ...
ai-patthana18.1:12.1_1: The three faculties associated with the five faculties is threefold. ... three associated with one knot, twofolded in the fivefold lesser world. ...
ai-patthana18.1:12.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana18.1:13.1_0: It doesn’t cause or reason to give rise to cause or reason for the sake of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.1:14.1_0: or cause a reason for teaching,
ai-patthana18.1:14.1_1: This is the section in brief.
